    • Method Detail

      • fromLeaves

        public static StructuralMotif fromLeaves(int identifier,
                                         Structure structure,
                                         java.util.List<LeafIdentifier> leafIdentifiers)
        Creates a StructuralMotif by extracting the given residues identified by a list of LeafIdentifiers.
        Parameters:
        identifier - The internally-used identifier of the StructuralMotif.
        structure - The Structure from which the StructuralMotif should be extracted.
        leafIdentifiers - The LeafIdentifiers of the residues that should compose the StructuralMotif.
        Returns:
        A new StructuralMotif.

      • fromLeaves

        public static StructuralMotif fromLeaves(Structure structure,
                                         java.util.List<LeafIdentifier> leafIdentifiers)
        Creates a StructuralMotif by extracting the given residues identified by a list of LeafIdentifiers. The resulting structural motif has the internal default identifier. This method is only save to use if you do not intent to bundle the resulting StructuralMotif in a superordinate BranchSubstructure.
        Parameters:
        structure - The Structure from which the StructuralMotif should be extracted.
        leafIdentifiers - The LeafIdentifiers of the residues that should compose the StructuralMotif.
        Returns:
        A new StructuralMotif.

      • fromLeaves

        public static StructuralMotif fromLeaves(int identifier,
                                         java.util.List<LeafSubstructure<?,?>> leafSubstructures)
        Forms a StructuralMotif out of the given LeafSubstructures.
        Parameters:
        identifier - The internally-used identifier of the StructuralMotif.
        leafSubstructures - The LeafSubstructures that should compose the StructuralMotif.
        Returns:
        A new StructuralMotif.

      • fromLeaves

        public static StructuralMotif fromLeaves(java.util.List<LeafSubstructure<?,?>> leafSubstructures)
        Forms a StructuralMotif out of the given LeafSubstructures. The resulting structural motif has the internal default identifier. This method is only save to use if you do not intent to bundle the resulting StructuralMotif in a superordinate BranchSubstructure.
        Parameters:
        leafSubstructures - The LeafSubstructures that should compose the StructuralMotif.
        Returns:
        A new StructuralMotif.

      • removeLeafSubstructure

        public void removeLeafSubstructure(LeafIdentifier leafIdentifier)
        Description copied from class: BranchSubstructure
        Removes the LeafSubstructure with the given LeafIdentifier and Bonds as well.

        FIXME this may produce a NPE

        Overrides:
        removeLeafSubstructure in class BranchSubstructure<StructuralMotif>
        Parameters:
        leafIdentifier - The LeafIdentifier of the atom to remove.

      • getOrderedLeafSubstructures

        public java.util.List<LeafSubstructure<?,?>> getOrderedLeafSubstructures()
        Returns the LeafSubstructures of this StructuralMotif exactly in the order they were given upon creation. This is a special implementation of StructuralMotif and should be used if one wants to ensure a correct predefined order when working with the LeafSubstructures independent of their sequence order.
        Returns:
        The ordered LeafSubstructures of this StructuralMotif.
